title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a £25,000 Easter ski holiday
text: VIP SKI is offering a holiday in two chalets for the Easter Holiday week of 3 April 2015 in the French Alps. Despite the blossoming size of the brand a sense of individuality and quality continues. VIP SKI is perfectly suited to families as well as groups of friends or couples. VIP SKI invites the lucky winners of this holiday for 24 people to indulge in the holiday delights of Morzine in the French Haute Savoie region. Whether the winners are looking for adrenaline-fuelled thrills on the slopes or prefer a vibrant après-ski scene or indeed a mixture of both the resort offers something for everyone. How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . The chalets Set amongst Morzine’s snow-dusted pistes and picturesque traditional streets, the prime location of VIP SKI’s luxury chalets offers the perfect base for enjoying all that Morzine has to offer. Chalet Du Bois, one of the exclusive mountain retreats, sleeps twelve to fourteen guests and is situated on the nursery slopes right in the centre of town. The Chalet is traditional Alpine décor fused with contemporary design where guests can choose from twin or double bedrooms with smart en suite facilities. The Chalet also has a large family suite with private lounge, perfect for a little privacy or seclusion. Après-ski relaxation is not forgotten, with a basement sauna and outside hot tub. Chalet Berger which sleeps 10 boasts a fantastic location right in the very heart of Morzine and only minutes from the piste and nursery slopes. Chalet Berger provides bundles of living space as well as the odd treat with a sunken hot tub on the outdoor terrace and a cinema room to relax in after a hearty supper. Included are return flights from London Gatwick, coach transfers, accommodation, catered chalet board of breakfast, afternoon tea, three course evening meal on six nights followed by cheese board and coffee and mints, wine, wake up drinks and canapés on the first and last evening. vip-chalets.com. Tailor made packages are available for Childcare and a Platinum service for luxury upgrades whilst away. Terms and conditions 1. Once notified, the winner must reply within two weeks to make arrangements to take the prize. 2. Prize consists of two chalets for 7 nights on departure date 03 April 2015. Prize includes flights from London Gatwick, coach transfers, accommodation, catered chalet board of breakfast, afternoon tea, three course evening meal on six nights followed by cheese board and coffee and mints, wine, wake up drinks and canapés on the first and last evening. 3. Prize does not include lift pass, ski hire, ski school and childcare. 4. The holiday prize is subject to availability, must be accepted as offered, is not transferable, refundable and there is no cash alternative. 5. The winner is responsible for all other costs incurred as part of the prize including but not limited to some beverages, spending money, travel insurance and ski packs 6. The travel element of any competition prize is subject to VIP SKI's normal conditions of carriage. 7. All tickets in connection with the competition are non-exchangeable and may not be transferred to third parties. In the event of cancellation by winners, for whatever reason, no alternative need be given. Once the booking is confirmed reservations may not be changed. 8. All other expenses associated with taking the trip shall be the responsibility of the winner. 9. The Passenger must ensure they comply in full with all relevant customs and immigration requirements, including the appropriate passport and visa requirements. Passengers are strongly advised to take out adequate travel insurance. Telegraphtravel
